text: Spread two rumors. The one that's losing his sight and the one that has a magic mirror in his house. Women will fall like flies in honey. Wait behind the door and tell each one that she's the girl in your eyes, making sure the others don't hear it, until it's their turn. The magic mirror can be easily improvised, going deep into the bathtub. As all are narcissists, they will be irresistibly bent toward the domestic abyss. You can then drown them to your liking or splash them to your liking. FIN
title: Receta casera
author: Juan José Arreola
